body:
Hi kiddos. Josh here

PSA: It's summer. Enough said.



Alright AMA kids. I'll answer any question. If it's "innapropiate" then message it to me on skype or whatever.


Skype: JJTheGuy999
Instagram: joshua_scottt
Twitter: JJTheGuy99
Snapchat: joshua_scottt


Background Info (because I looked at Eric's post and why not):
Name is Josh. Turned 16 on May 17th. Been here for over 3 years and a half. I surf and skateboard. I have a youtube channel because yolo. I have a girlfriend (I think? Idk it's complicated, y'all understand). I enjoy beatboxing and living life to the fullest. If I die, it was either sharks, my brother, or my mom.
